name: Puzzles & Jigsaws Pro
description:
Puzzles & Jigsaws Pro is the best jigsaw app from the AppStore. It is a highly addictive and relaxing game that provides endless hours of entertainment and fun for the whole family.

Puzzles & Jigsaws Pro features:

. One free puzzle every day!
· Create and share puzzles from your gallery.
· Tons of High quality images.
· Great gameplay, easy to use.
· Amazing jigsaws up to 2,000 pieces.
· Automatic game saving.

Thanks to all for playing Puzzles & Jigsaws. You can Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/rangamesfan
twitter.com/rangames

¡Get it now and enjoy it!
